entry.title: 树莓派记2
entry.content:
树莓派记2

不要问我为什么没有1

心心念念好久的树莓派终于到了。在拿到之后竟有些失落。不知为何，可能是少了那种期待，也可能是最近几天不知道为什么对任何事情都失去了激情。废话不多说，先写一下总结的技术要点吧。

  1. 安装Raspbian
  2. 在无显示器，键盘鼠标的情况下如何SSH
  3. 换apt源
  4. Xrdp实现Windows远程登陆树莓派桌面
  5. FRP内网穿透

1. 安装Raspbian

我买的树莓派套餐里给的SD卡里预装了NOOBS(给萌新装系统的工具，操作简单，适合新手)。 但是我又没有显示屏，所以只能选择自己装系统。

  1. 将卡插入读卡器。

  2. 格式化SD卡，工具SD Card Formatter。简单的格一下就好了。

  3. 下载镜像，地址
    建议新手下载这个

  4. 烧录系统，工具Win32DiskImage。选好磁盘，写入即可。烧完后磁盘背重命名成boot而且只有200多MB，正常现象不必惊慌。Windows可能会提醒你格式化已查看，不必理会，取消即可。

2. 在无显示器，键盘鼠标的情况下如何ssh。

由于预算(穷)问题，我并没有买键鼠，显示屏。但是这点问题并不能难到我。

方案一（推荐）：

  1. 将卡插进读卡器。

  2. 找到boot目录，新建文件ssh(注意不要有后缀名)。

  3. boot目录下新建wpa_supplicant.conf，按照下面的格式填入内容并保存wpa_supplicant.conf文件。

  4. 插电启动树莓派，Google Play安装NetX，扫描局域网，多出来的就是raspberry pi的ip。

  5. 用SSH连接树莓派

    默认用户名pi 默认密码：raspberry。

方案二：

  1. 将卡插入读卡器。
  2. 找到boot目录，新建文件ssh(注意不要有后缀名)
  3. 准备一条数据线，一头连到手机，另一头连树莓派USB。
  4. 打开手机的USB网络共享。
  5. Google Play安装NetX，扫描局域网，多出来的就是raspberry pi的ip。
  6. 手机上安装JuiceSSH链接即可。默认用户名pi 默认密码：raspberry。

3. 换apt源

出于地区限制，apt的速度会非常慢，这时换一个好的镜像就尤为重要。换镜像源是基本操作，不多赘述了。可参考https://mirror.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/raspbian/

换完之后记得更新

4. Xrdp实现Windows远程登陆树莓派桌面

之所以要安装Xrdp是因为，如果仅仅通过ssh连接树莓派是看不到图形界面的，想要看到的话可以通过VNC或其他远程桌面软件。选xrdp纯粹是为了方便，因为在任何Windows操作系统上可以用mstsc。

  5. 打开mstsc (Win + R)，输入树莓派IP地址，点击连接。
    没错的话，就可以登上了

5. FRP内网穿透

大部分时候我们是不在局域网的，这时候我们就需要内网穿透。

  1. 下载地址Github
  2. 记得选择正确的版本，像我是Raspberry Pi 4B用的是armv7l所以我该选arm版的。

entry.title: Third-English-Blog
entry.content:
Third blog for Shadows cast by stars

Avalon is a interesting girl in the story. Although she is not the main character, I still think she will be an important character in the story. Let’s organize the relationship between Avalon and Cass.

Avalon and Cass meet for the first time when Cass and Pual firts come to the Island. At that time, I feel that Avalon is not friendly to Cass. It gives me a bad impression of the people in the Island.

Cass meets Avalon for the second time at Madda’s home. Avalon said a strange sentence to Cass “Do you miss it? The Corridor.” That shows that Avalon doesn’t like living on the Island. Accroding to Madda, When Avalon lived in Corridor, she had a modern life. I think Avalon had use to the modern way and she must want to keep away from the old way.

For the third time, Cass and Avalon meet at the gathering and Cass finds that Avalon like Bran as well, she even kiss Bran. In later stories, I think Avalon will become the main opponent of Cass. They have the different lifestyle, they both like the same boy.

Paul will be in a awkward situation, he like Avalon but Avalon is the enemy of his sister. Which side will Pual choose? Cass side? or Avalon side?

I am looking forward to the following plot.

entry.title: Second-English-Blog
entry.content:
Second blog for Shadows cast by stars

When Cass and Helen are doing the basket with other women, I notice that all the women show the obvious hostility to Cass. Cass wants to say something against, but Helen ask Cass to pretend her didn’t hear. So, I have two question. One is that why the women show the hostility? The other is that why Helen choose to submit to humiliation? In my opinion, I think that the women may get some hurt from the new people and now they can’t trust other people like Cass. According to Madda, there are something bad happend to Helen and Madda can’t tell Cass now. I wonder what is happen to Helen.

Madda gives Cass medicine bag and tell her don’t open it, she will know when the time is right. But Cass opens it on the way back to home. There a carving inside, a tiny woman’s face chiseled out of cedar. Then the carving makes Cass feel uncomfortable, so Cass just throws it into river. How can a carving be a medicince? What will happen when Madda know that Cass throw the carving, will it cause some bad consequence?

When their father look at the old picture, he chooses to hide the truth of the boy. I am interested in who is the little boy and why father chooses to don’t tell the truth to the kids. In my views, the boy may the brother of Mr. Mercredi and the boy already died because of Mr. Mercredi. That is one of the reason why Mr. Mercredi and his wife choose to Corridor.

entry.title: First-English-Blog
entry.content:
First blog for Shadows cast by stars

Here is my first blog for Shadows cast by stars. I will write down some thoughts and observations.

When I read the book, I think there is not a wrong side as a spectator. For the UA, they just want to save the white people. Maybe they believe that using one life to save more lives is a right thing. For “The Band”, they want to survive and have a normal life. I think the reason why we think the UA is evil is because the main characters are Métis. If the main character is a white person who has the plague and the UA cure him. The UA may become a good government.

The reason why Paul fight with others is interested me. Paul fight with them because they call Paul “Apple”. Apple means that Red outside and white inside. It is a ridicule for Métis. In China, there is something similar to “Apple”. We call a Chinese person who more readily or strongly identifies with Western culture than traditional Chinese culture “Banana”. It means that Yellow outside and White inside.

I have observed that Cass doesn’t find her “Shade” yet. I think the abilities of Cass are powerful, so it costs more time for Cass to discover.

entry.title: 圣诞计划
19-11-30-diary
entry.content:
日记 19/11/30

    最近老想着搞个树莓派玩玩，但是不知道我买了以后会不会成“吃灰派”。所以我理智分析了很久，做了全方面的调查。选中了下面的套餐。

    之所以选这个是因为：第一树莓派并不需要键鼠，所以Complete Starter Kit 自然pass,第二裸板有不太好，所以选了Starter Kit。这个一共CA $134，而且我手上有100美刀去银行存起来大概换给CA $132 自己贴两块钱刚刚好。

    下面来讨论一下利弊。

利:

  1. 可以搭建NAS,正好用上我的旧硬盘。
  2. 我一直想搭一个天气和snowday情况播放系统。
  3. 对于学习Python和Linux还是很好的。
  4. 相较于软件，我对硬件更感兴趣所以GPIO是一个优点。

弊：

  1. 花钱，成本高。我选中的将近 $100 - CA $134.
  2. 不知道自己有多大的兴趣，可能成为“吃灰派”
  3. 花父母的钱，心里不舒服。

    今天暂且无法得出结论日记到此。

后续更新 19/12/08

    最后，还是买了选的是Raspberry Pi 4 Ultimate Kit 要CA $149在加上一个CA $7的风扇。本来想着CA $156还好，结果加上运费和HST。妈的要CA $192。 好心疼。😢😢

买完后，意志消沉了一天，什么也没干。总感觉唉。。。一个字亏。作业也没动。草。

  2. 创建两个分支：master 与 gh-pages；

  3. 设置GitHub pages的显示页面

  4. 使用

  5. 在本地仓库下用Git bash依次执行npm install hexo、hexo init、npm install 和 npm install hexo-deployer-git（此时当前分支应显示为gh-pages）;

entry.title: 安装Hexo
entry.content:
安装篇

简介：

那啥多的我也不多说了，相关知识自行谷歌。此文章参考自知乎大佬”CS专业那些事”的文章

准备：

  1. 注册GitHub账号全球最大同性交友网站，至于怎么详细的用，我会另起博客。

  2. 安装git至于Git是啥我会另起一篇文章

    具体步骤：

  3. 安装成功后，将你的Git与GitHub帐号绑定

    鼠标右击打开Git Bash.
    设置user.name和user.email配置信息：

    生成ssh密钥文件：

    然后直接三个回车即可，默认不需要设置密码
    然后找到生成的.ssh的文件夹中的id_rsa.pub密钥(一般在用户文件夹里)，将内容全部复制(用notepad++即可)

    打开GitHub_Settings_keys 页面，新建new SSH Key. Title随便填，把复制到公钥粘贴进去。然后Add SSH Key.

    在Git Bash中检测GitHub公钥设置是否成功，输入 ssh git@github.com

    如上则说明成功。这里之所以设置GitHub密钥原因是，通过非对称加密的公钥与私钥来完成加密，公钥放置在GitHub上，私钥放置在自己的电脑里。GitHub要求每次推送代码都是合法用户，所以每次推送都需要输入账号密码验证推送用户是否是合法用户，为了省去每次输入密码的步骤，采用了ssh，当你推送的时候，git就会匹配你的私钥跟GitHub上面的公钥是否是配对的，若是匹配就认为你是合法用户，则允许推送。这样可以保证每次的推送都是正确合法的。

  4. 安装node.js

    Hexo基于Node.js，Node.js下载地址：Download | Node.js 下载安装包，注意安装Node.js会包含环境变量及npm的安装，安装后，检测Node.js是否安装成功，在命令行中输入 node -v 有数字说明成功了。QWQ

  5. 安装hexo

    Hexo就是我们的个人博客网站的框架， 这里需要自己在电脑常里创建一个文件夹，可以命名为Blog，Hexo框架与以后你自己发布的网页都在这个文件夹中。创建好后，进入文件夹中，按住shift键，右击鼠标点击命令行(这里有个坑，如果是powershell的话详见传送门)

至此，我们就安装完了具体使用的话详见下篇博客。

entry.title: 序章
entry.content:
这几天，我一直在思考。如果我想考一个好大学，我是否应该提升一下我的编程水平了，但是我却看不下去视频和书。于是我便想利用建站和git以此来激发我的兴趣。

另外一些原因

1.本来我是搭建了一个wordpress博客在我的谷歌云上，但是我的谷歌云会过期，我的内容会消失这样有背我的初衷，记录生活，记录折腾。

2.其次，对于一个程序员来说我认为git，Github和markdown的使用是一个很重要的事，遂选择以md为主的hexo框架，并且利用GitHub pages来建这个站。

3.我对于php并不熟悉，可以说是什么都不知道，所以以php为主的wordpress并不适合我。

正如我的subtitles所引用的一样“路漫漫其修远兮，吾将上下而求索”。我将利用暑假时间好好学习相关知识。
